mapper.select: select a.id as user_id , a.uname as user_name , b.product_id , b.product_name , c.product_count , c.product_price, d.total_price , d.order_time, (c.product_count * c.product_price) as single_price from `user` a join user_order d on a.id = d.user_id join order_product c on d.id = c.order_id join product b on b.id = c.product_id where a.id = #{userid};
